channel.title: Do not buy a google chromebook/chromebox
channel.description: I made the mistake of buying a Google Chromebox. I played around with it, had some fun, but then I realized that I never used it after three weeks of owning it. The purpose in making the purchase was to see if Google Chrome OS was right for me, but it wasn't. All it is is Google Chrome with some added settings to manage some operating system level hardware, like WiFi, display, etc. If you want to try out Google Chrome OS, just download Google Chrome...

item.title: Do not buy a google chromebook/chromebox
item.dc:creator: @Phillipe Phillipé
item.description:
@Phillipe wrote:

[quote=“Teh Spede, post:8, topic:447123”][quote author=t4 link=topic=550022.msg4031729#msg4031729 date=1340843397]
google doesn’t offer the OS for non-chromebooks?
[/quote]http://chromeos.hexxeh.net/[/quote]

The point still stands, ChromiumOS != ChromeOS. It lacks a lot of functionality that ChromeOS actually has.

Read full topic
item.source: Do not buy a google chromebook/chromebox

item.title: Do not buy a google chromebook/chromebox
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

I wouldn’t buy one, but I guess some people actually like the thing. Just because you didn’t find a use for it, doesn’t mean nobody should buy one.

Read full topic
